## PromptHelper.click() method

Creates a prompt that resolves when the player clicks on the given button. The button will be displayed in a message seen only by the prompted player. When resolved, the clicked button will be returned.

**Signature:**

```typescript
click<TButton extends Button>(object: TButton, options?: IButtonClickOptions): Promise<TButton>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | TButton | <code>Button</code> to be clicked. |
|  options | [IButtonClickOptions](./bge-core.ibuttonclickoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional options to configure the prompt. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;TButton&gt;

A promise that resolves to the clicked button.
